/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the warmth of a sunny day. The sky, a vast expanse of blue, is lightly speckled with a few clouds. The sun, a radiant orb, shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene below.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Several cars, painted in shades of white, black, and gray, are scattered across the road. They are in various states of motion - some are stationary at traffic lights, while others appear to be in motion, adding a dynamic element to the scene.

On either side of the street, buildings rise up, their facades a mix of colors and architectural styles. They stand tall against the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. Interspersed between these buildings are trees, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.

The image is taken from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the scene. This perspective enhances the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, taking in the view.
